scripts.lint: if grep -R '\`[^\n]*WHERE [^\n]* = \${' --exclude-dir=node_modules --exclude-dir=.git --line-number .; then echo 'Found interpolated SQL'; exit 1; else echo 'SQL interpolation lint passed'; fi
